<link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;c69b8868.1503</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of iacm<br>Sent: 05 March 2015 14:42<br>To: iacm<br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd March 2015<br><br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd March 2015<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international events organized in the frame of IACM.<br><br>WCCM 2016 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Call for mini-symposium for WCCM2016<br><br>12th World Congress on Computational Mechanics \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd WCCM 2016 [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T12:03:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator> <title>FW: Young Investigators Conference - Open Call for 2017 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;d013535d.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Please find attached an open call for organising the ECCOMAS Young Investigator Conference for 2017. It would be great if one of the colleagues would be interested in bidding to host the event. However, it is important that young investigators run and organise the event, eventually with the support of senior colleagues.<br>Please come back to me, if you are interested. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T18:35:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;d013535d.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;34b99559.1502">   <title>FW: Expressions No. 36 - electronic version </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;34b99559.1502</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br>attached is the recent number of Expressions, the IACM publication.<br>Regards<br>Carlo<br><br>From: iacm@cimne.upc.edu [mailto:iacm@cimne.upc.edu]<br>Sent: 18 February 2015 17:00<br>To: carlo.sansour@nottingham.ac.uk<br>Subject: Expressions No. 36 - electronic version<br><br>Dear Prof. Sansour<br><br>Following your request to receive the Expressions in electronic version I'm sending you attached to this e-mail the latest issue of Expressions (No. 36), also available on our website here&lt;http://www.iacm.info/vpage/1/0/IACM-Expressions/Expressions-Archive&gt;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T17:43:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;34b99559.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;975a6675.1502">   <title>FW: ECCOMAS Announcement - February 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;975a6675.1502</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: eccomas-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:eccomas-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of eccomas<br>Sent: 13 February 2015 08:44<br>To: eccomas<br>Subject: ECCOMAS Announcement - February 2015<br><br>ECCOMAS Announcement - February 2015<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international conferences organized under the auspices of ECCOMAS and other activities of ECCOMAS.<br><br>Full information is posted on: www.eccomas.org&lt;http://www.eccomas.org&gt;.<br><br>ECCOMAS ECCM VI and ECFD VII: Open Call for 2018 [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-16T14:18:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;975a6675.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;599740f.1502">   <title>ECCOMAS PhD awards </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;599740f.1502</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br>This is the last reminder of the ECCOMAS best PhD thesis award. Deadline for nominations is the 16th of this month.<br>Regards<br>Carlo    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T11:45:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;599740f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;baf1910d.1502">   <title>FW: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd February 2015</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;baf1910d.1502</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of iacm<br>Sent: 05 February 2015 14:54<br>To: iacm<br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd February 2015<br><br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd February 2015<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international events organized in the frame of IACM.<br><br>IACM SPECIAL INTEREST CONFERENCES \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd UPCOMING DEADLINE<br><br>XIII International Conference Computational Plasticity. Fundamentals and Applications (COMPLAS XIII) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T11:21:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;baf1910d.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;e7195777.1502">   <title>ECCOMAS best PhD award </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;e7195777.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>A reminder that nomination for ECCOMAS best PhD award are due by 16th of Feb. Even if we do not succeed a nomination is still worthwhile because the first three listed from the UK will be invited and financially supported to participate in ECCOMAS Young Investigator's Conference this year.<br>Best regards<br>Carlo    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-02T10:42:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;e7195777.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;9e97fc6d.1501">   <title>FW: ECCOMAS Announcement - January 2015 (2) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;9e97fc6d.1501</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: eccomas-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:eccomas-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of eccomas<br>Sent: 28 January 2015 08:44<br>To: eccomas<br>Subject: ECCOMAS Announcement - January 2015 (2)<br><br>ECCOMAS Announcement - January 2015 (2)<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international conferences organized under the auspices of ECCOMAS and other activities of ECCOMAS.<br><br>Full information is posted on: www.eccomas.org&lt;http://www.eccomas.org&gt;.<br><br>ECCOMAS Young Investigators Conference 2015: NEW DEADLINE [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-29T14:57:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;9e97fc6d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;56f04f54.1501">   <title>FW: ECCOMAS Thematic Conferences - Open Call for 2017 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;56f04f54.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br>Please find attached the open call for ECCOMAS thematic conferences for the year 2017. Deadline is the 15th of April. I would like to encourage the colleagues to think of organising such a conference. Please come back to me if you intend to do so.<br><br>Best regards<br>Carlo<br><br>From: eccomas@cimne.upc.edu [mailto:eccomas@cimne.upc.edu]<br>Sent: 20 January 2015 10:21<br>To: carlo.sansour@nottingham.ac.uk<br>Subject: ECCOMAS Thematic Conferences - Open Call for 2017 [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-20T10:51:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;56f04f54.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;973abad3.1501">   <title>FW: Announcement of the ECCOMAS Award for the Two Best Phd Theses in 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;973abad3.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Attached is the Open Call for ECCOMAS best PhD awards. Deadline for UK-submissions is February 16th. Please send me your nomination which then will be evaluated by our prize committee. There will be one nomination from the UK but the first three will be invited to participate in the Young Investigators Conference 2015 in Aachen and will be provided with some financial support by ECCOMAS. The UK nomination receives also the prize for the best UK-PhD award at the ACME conference in Swansea. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T17:43:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;973abad3.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;d62539a0.1501">   <title>FW: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd January 2015</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;d62539a0.1501</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of iacm<br>Sent: 14 January 2015 14:50<br>To: iacm<br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd January 2015<br><br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd January 2015<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international events organized in the frame of IACM.<br><br>IACM SPECIAL INTERESTING CONFERENCES \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd NEW DEADLINE<br><br>IV International Conference on Computational Methods in Marine Engineering (MARINE 2015) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T17:34:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;d62539a0.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;151a0491.1501">   <title>FW: Call for Papers: CC2015 & CSC2015 Conferences: Prague September 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;151a0491.1501</link>   <description> FYI    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-13T16:33:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;151a0491.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;24d483a3.1501">   <title>FW: ECCOMAS Announcement - December 2014 (correction)<br><br>There was a small error in the information about the 2016 Congress, therefore we are sending it again. Apologies for the inconvenience<br>_______<br>ECCOMAS Announcement - December 2014<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international conferences organized under the auspices of ECCOMAS and other activities of ECCOMAS. December 2014<br><br>ECCOMAS Announcement - December 2014<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international conferences organized under the auspices of ECCOMAS and other activities of ECCOMAS.<br><br>Full information is posted on: www.eccomas.org&lt;http://www.eccomas.org&gt;.<br><br>ECCOMAS Congress 2016: ANNOUNCEMENT<br><br>European Congress on Computational Methods in Applied Sciences and Engineering [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-10T16:08:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;f2aa7c03.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;dd760645.1412">   <title>FW: Open Call for Minisymposia </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;dd760645.1412</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: ECCOMAS Congress 2016 [mailto:info@eccomas2016.org]<br>Sent: 09 December 2014 10:10<br>To: carlo.sansour@nottingham.ac.uk<br>Subject: Open Call for Minisymposia<br><br>ECCOMAS Congress 2016<br>5 - 10 June 2016 Crete Island, Greece<br>European Congress on Computational Methods in Applied Sciences and Engineering<br><br>The European Community on Computational Methods in Applied Sciences (ECCOMAS) is pleased to announce the ECCOMAS Congress 2016 (7th European Congress on Computational Methods in Applied Sciences and Engineering) (http://www.eccomas2016.org/&lt;http://r.email-icmes.com/8q9yx658ltx3d.html&gt;) to be held in Crete, Greece in June 5-10, 2016. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T12:18:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;dd760645.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;890c3cb6.1412">   <title>FW: Deadline ACME-UK Conference 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;890c3cb6.1412</link>   <description> Please have a look.<br>Regards<br>Carlo<br><br>From: Gil A.J. [mailto:a.j.gil@swansea.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 04 December 2014 17:32<br>To: 'Carlo Sansour' (Carlo.Sansour@nottingham.ac.uk)<br>Cc: Gil A.J.; Sevilla R.<br>Subject: Deadline ACME-UK Conference 2015<br><br>Dear Carlo,<br><br>Could you please forward this e-mail to all ACME members?<br><br>Best regards<br><br>Antonio<br><br>DEADLINE ACME-UK 2015 Conference for one-page abstract<br><br>Dear colleague,<br><br>The deadline for the submission of the one-page abstract to the forthcoming ACME-UK Conference 2015 is fast approaching, 19th December. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-04T17:36:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;890c3cb6.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;fa3bd76a.1412">   <title>FW: Lecturer position and Ph.D. at Cardiff University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;fa3bd76a.1412</link>   <description> I am forwarding an announcement for two positions. Please see the message below.<br>Regards<br>Carlo<br><br>From: Pierre Kerfriden [mailto:pierre.kerfriden@gmail.com]<br>Sent: 30 November 2014 21:41<br>To: Carlo.Sansour@nottingham.ac.uk<br>Subject: Lecturer position and Ph.D. at Cardiff University<br><br>Dear Carlo,<br><br>Would you please announce the following Lecturer position at Cardiff University (Computational Mechanics)<br>http://imechanica.org/node/17562<br><br>And the following PhD position offer (Numerical methods for composite fracture)<br>http://imechanica.org/node/17563 [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-01T13:01:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;fa3bd76a.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;ad992d98.1412">   <title>FW: RA position at Swansea </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;ad992d98.1412</link>   <description> Please see the forwarded message.<br>Regards<br>Carlo<br><br>From: Li C.F. BORDAS&quot; [mailto:stephane.bordas@alum.northwestern.edu]<br>Sent: 23 November 2014 09:30<br>To: computational_mechanics_discussion<br>Cc: Carlo Sansour; Pierre KERFRIDEN; Antonio Ferreira<br>Subject: Aifantis International Symposium Invitation<br><br>Dear all<br><br>With the presence of Nobel prize winner Dan Shechtman this should be a very motivating conference, also for students.<br><br>Please let me know if you'd like to organise symposia at this occasion [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-24T12:01:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;50a13694.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;2b649b23.1411">   <title>FW: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd November 2014</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;2b649b23.1411</link>   <description> FYI<br><br>From: iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu [mailto:iacm-bounces@listas.cimne.upc.edu] On Behalf Of iacm<br>Sent: 12 November 2014 16:19<br>To: iacm<br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd November 2014<br><br>Subject: IACM Newsletter \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd November 2014<br><br>You will find below updated information of upcoming international events organized in the frame of IACM.<br><br>IACM SPECIAL INTERESTING CONFERENCES \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd EXTENDED DEADLINE<br><br>1st Pan-American Congress on Computational Mechanics (PANACM 2015) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-18T11:07:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carlo Sansour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACME;2b649b23.1411</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
